As we continue evaluating our options, could you elaborate on how your school handles parent involvement and communication regarding student progress?

conversation.message: Thank you for noting our emphasis on exploratory play—we believe it is fundamental to development. Regarding parent involvement, we view our relationship as a crucial partnership. Communication is transparent and frequent: every parent receives daily updates via a secure digital platform detailing activities, nutrition, and specific learning moments. Beyond these daily check-ins, we schedule individualized progress meetings three times a year, focusing on collaborative goal-setting based on formal assessments. We also offer various opportunities for involvement, such as 'Open House' reading sessions and volunteering for special projects, ensuring parents feel integrated into their child's educational journey.
